entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Penticton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 10:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: S 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
